        - Following Text: "![Tonifying Decoction .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/ba/Tonifying_Decoction_.jpg)| Mirage Pill | Epic | Formula | Formula found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow, past the Scorpion Prince and up the hill inside a golden box

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a torn, aged document resembling a formula or recipe, written in Chinese characters. Based on the surrounding text, it is likely a formula for crafting items in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The document appears to represent one of several collectible formulas, such as the "Body-Fleeting Powder," "Essence Decoction," "Mirage Pill," or "Life-Saving Pill," which players can find or purchase in specific locations during the game. These formulas are tied to gameplay progression and resource crafting.
